content:
Hello! I am a Master’s Student in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering] at the Pennsylvania State University. I am a member of the Systems and Internet Infrastructure Security Laboratory, and advised by Prof. Patrick McDaniel.
My research focuses on Internet of Things and Machine Learning systems. I am mainly interested in building more secure and privacy preserving computer systems.
